item.title: Complete God of War Sons of Sparta Trophy List‚ÄîHow To Get All Achievements & Trophies
item.content:encoded:
Calling all PlayStation Spartans in training, there‚Äôs a hydra-sized God of War Sons of Sparta Trophy List for you to climb, making the arduous trek to Olympus seem like child‚Äôs play.

A Metroidvania God of War title was a constant discussion in the rumor pipeline for a long time. The speculation suggested a rumoured God of War Metroidvania game would feature Kratos‚Äô Brother, and it does.

Now that Sons of Sparta is here, there‚Äôs no mystery left, other than its Trophy List. A mystery solved in this guide right now.

All God of War Sons of Sparta Trophies & Achievements

God of War Sons of Sparta technically has two Trophy Lists: A listed one and a secret list of hidden trophies‚Äîobscured to prevent spoilers. In the main list, you need to find most (if not all) collectibles and upgrades, find lore, and battle strong enemies who would rather see Kratos and Deimos be unalived.

  • More Insider Gaming: Does God of War Sons of Sparta Have A Physical Edition? Price, Explained

A list further down will reveal all the hidden trophies if you wish to view them, but this is a major spoiler warning.

Here‚Äôs the complete list of trophies revealed from the start of the game:

  • Duty and Honor: Collect all Trophies
  • The Tourist: Find all Lore
  • The Historian: Collect all Shards
  • The Opportunist: Collect and return all Artifacts
  • Search High and Low: Activate all Globes
  • Self Sufficient: Enhance a Spear or Shield Part
  • Quick Study: Purchase a Skill
  • Panoply Man: Obtain all Spear and Shield Parts
  • Like a Charm: Obtain all Charms
  • Bust Out: Obtain all Bust Powers
  • Deep Learning: Obtain all Skills
  • All Eyes on Thee: Battle the Escaped

This is your final spoiler warning!

  • The Lionheart: Return the Lion Coat
  • Rightful Owners: Return the Treasure Map
  • Stonewalled: Open the Gorgon Door
  • Cryptic: Open the Mosaic Door
  • Song of the Six: Free the Final Owl
  • Eye for an Eye: Battle the Cyclops
  • Flying Solo: Battle the Bird
  • Bathed in Blood: Battle the Blood
  • Pecking Order: Battle the Twin
  • Evil Within: Battle the Ancient
  • Sea Sickness: Battle the Serpent
  • Wing and a Prayer: Battle the Triplet
  • Heavy Metal: Battle the Bulls
  • Horsing Around: Battle the Tyrant
  • Herding Cats: Fulfill Circe‚Äôs Request
  • False Prophet: Stop the Cult Revival
  • With It or On It: Carry the Boy Home
  • Come to a Head: Battle the Dragon Heads
  • No Olive Branch: Complete all Olive Tree Battles
  • Amusing: Complete all Muse Chambers
  • Battle Tested: Complete all Ephor Trials
  • Gift of the Gods: Obtain all Blessings of Olympus
  • Thunderstruck: Battle the Beast
  • The Summit: Battle the Trio

How Many Achievements & Trophies In God of War Sons of Sparta?

There are 36 unique trophies to earn across God of War Sons of Sparta, with the final one being the shiny Platinum Trophy.

  • More Insider Gaming: Is God of War Sons of Sparta on Xbox, PC or Nintendo Switch? All Platforms, Explained

There you have it, you know every trophy in the game, what to do, and how many there are‚Äîso what are you waiting for?

Check out the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server, where you can talk about your GOW troubles, adoration, and pet peeves, trying to get the final few trophies!

Make sure you‚Äôre completely caught up on the shocking God of War Original Trilogy Remake Announcement.

item.title: Bryan Dechart and More Cast in God of War: Sons of Sparta
item.content:encoded:
The voice cast for God of War: Sons of Sparta features a roster of voice-acting veterans, including one who expressed excitement about the February Sony PlayStation State of Play presentation.

God of War: Sons of Sparta was the final game announced during the State of Play. The game, the long-awaited 2.5D title in the God of War franchise, was announced by TC Carson. The original voice of Kratos reprises that role in the game that was stealth-dropped after the presentation concluded.

The cast also includes Debi Derryberry, known for voicing Jimmy Neutron among other iconic roles, and Bryan Dechart. Dechart is perhaps best known for playing Connor in Detroit: Become Human. He previously shared his excitement about the State of Play on social media, and now he‚Äôs reacted to playing the role of Agon, the Pit of Agonies.

His wife, Amelia Rose Blaire, is also featured in the game. She will be voicing Eleonora.

More Names Featured in the New God of War Title

Antony Del Rio, known for voicing Pit in Super Smash Bros., will be voicing young Kratos. Scott Menville, known for his work as Robin on Teen Titans, is voicing young Demios. James Mathis III voices Konstantinos, and AJ LoCasios voices Petros.

Additional stars include Shelby Young as Amara and Jack Quaid as Eis. Allen Covert, Chris Ansell, and more are also featured in the cast.

The game, first reported by Tom Henderson of Insider Gaming as in the works, is now available digitally on PS5 for $29.99.

Check out every game announced at the February 2026 State of Play here.

How excited are you for the new title in the God of War franchise? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
